rules_text:
{1}{R}, Discard a card: Draw a card. Put a bloodstain counter on this enchantment if you discarded a creature card this way.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice this enchantment: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If this enchantment had three or more bloodstain counters on it, that creature gains haste until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
